reviews.review:
Welcome to my review as a high level survivor and killer (1000 hours+)

What is Dead By Daylight?
After waiting a lot of time in queue there is a minigame where you and your friends must fix generators and run in circles while a clown is chasing you.

What i dont like:
I am disappointed about the game in terms of balance, the matchmaking, the queue-times and the servers.

-Balance on the killer side:
Some killers are forever stuck in garbage tier and now they added 1 more killer (the doctor) so the wraith is not alone is garbo tier
Nurse needs a rework (autoaim) - since September 2016
Facecamp - must get fixed its here since forever...
Killers host games so its in their hands, if its laggy or not
Exploit perks like DS, so it doesnt work
Brutal Strengt is so essential and must be an in-build perk so killer can choose betweeen other perks
The Doctor, with the nonstop grap while in threatment mode needs a fix

-Balance on the survivor side:
Selfcare needs a rework
Survivors are still to strong. But it is really hard to fix. Cause survivors are actually only to strong on a high skill level

Survivor Items in generall:
If a survivor pulls the plug he doesnt loose the item
When the killer disconnects normally or also with the plug you lose your items almost every time. Also offerings like Black Ward won't save it.

-Balance on the maps:
I must say the maps are in a pretty good balance now. They need remove some pallets here and there but i feel with bloodlust the killers and the surviors are in a pretty balanced state.

-Matchmaking is random. Even tho they say it is fixed. It is acutally not.
Rank 1s Get rank 20s in the game. Also almost all of the rank 1s cant play the game properly. A new rank system is needed.

-Queue time as SWF (surviving with friends) is horror. Doesnt work at all. The survivor game inviter must search in specific regions to find games which is pretty annoying and time wasting.

What i like:
Even though there are alot of cons i love to play the game, with friends or with randoms or as a killer. It all makes fun and i must say the game needs some more adjustment but it is in a pretty good state now and i can give a postivie review! :)

Game can be annoying but has amazing potential.
But easy to die and only about 1/10 games you will actually win as a survivor.
Glad they finally added the option to play with friends.
7.5/10

In the new patch I went from being able to run this game at 30-40 FPS to only about 20 with massive lag spikes that bring it down to single digits. I dont have the best computer by any means, but this game really doesn't even look that good on ultra so I don't understand why it giving me such bad problems. Not only is this game laggy, the mechanics are terrible which I was hoping to be fixed in the latest patch but honestly they have seemed to have gotten worse. Killers hit you when they are stunned or when they aren't close to you. But possibly the worst mechanic in this game is wiggling out of a killer's grip. Countless times I've experienced filling up the bar then somehow being thrown onto a hook 2 seconds later. Killers also need a massive nerf. All killer perks are super useful and most survivor perks pretty much have no use, with the exception of about 8-10 for all characters. The main problem with killers is Mike Myers and the hill billy. Any killer that can instantly down you without any perk should not be in the game and their should also be no killer perk that lets you kill every survivor the first time you get them down. Another problem in the new patch, that's small compared to other gameplay problems, but is still very annoying is the adjusted hitboxes for skill checks. I was playing a game where I got the skill check right on the edge of the great zone and I ended up failing it somehow. Possibly the biggest problem in this game is killers that camp. I get that this isn't a glitch or bug in the game, but there needs to be a penalty added to the game for staying in a certain radius to a hooked survivor. The also needs to be a serious overall in the matchmaking process. Sometimes it takes upwards of 15 minutes for me and two or three of my other friends to find either a killer or one more person. This could be fixed if there was servers instead of having the killer host, which would decrease seriously laggy games. There should also be penalties for leaving a match as a killer or survivor a certain amount of times. So many times I've gotten into a game and a teammate leaves which puts my team at a serious disadvantage or worse a killer leaves and I lose my offering and progress towards ranking up. One other problem in this game is how sometimes a survivor will spawn so close to the killer. I've even been able to see the killer before I can start moving, which instantly ruins the match. For the next few patches here's what needs to be fixed: Let someone be able to escape the killer as soon as they wiggle out, reposition hit boxes for survivors, have skill checks be true to the zone that it shows you, penalize killers and survivors that quit mid game, fix matchmaking times, nerf killers being able to instantly down someone, remove the perk that lets killers instantly kill all survivors, penalize killers that stay close to a hocked survivor/exit and most importantly find a way for the game to be less demanding. This game has serious potential to be great, but I definitely will not be playing as much if at all now until there is some serious performance updates, balancing in gameplay, various glitches and bugs removed and a better system for matchmaking. Would not recommend the game AS OF NOW, but I think if most, but preferably all of these problems were fixed this could be one of the top survival games out there.

Instead of telling you all the pros and cons of Dead by Daylight, I'll first make a list of all the bugs, glitches and other flaws that still happen to me and my friends regularly over 6 month after the game was fully released:

[list]
[*]The game freezes or crashes while searching for a game, entering a game or playing a game.
[*]It often takes literal hours to get into a lobby.
[*]Matchmaking is terrible. You, as middle rank Survivor, can end up with three low rank Survs against a rank 1 Killer. Or you play against 4 rank 1 Survs as rank 20 (lowest possible rank) Killer. There are no limits for this idiocy.
[*]There is a feature to play "Survive with Friends" together with your steamfriends. However, you often end up alone in the public lobby while you friends get disconnected.
[*]If you actually made it into a game, you might be the only Survivor left. It can happen that your teammates get disconnected during the loading screen, especially when the Killer has a bad internet connection.
[*]The game works with a so called P2P connection. That means, that it depends on the lobby host (the Killer) if there is lag or not. Of course there is lag in many games (no, it's not my connection).
[*]The lag doesn't only affect your movement, but also the skill checks. The indicator will tremble which makes it really hard to succeed the skill check.
[*]Skill checks often pop up after you went away from the generator. But then you can't even do them successfully anymore.
[*]There are skill checks that can't physically be done successfully. When the skill-check-area is in the first third of the circle, you only have 0.3 seconds time to react. The shortest reaction time of a human is between 0.2 and 0.3 seconds. This is the time your brain needs to realize what's happening. Then add a few tenth of seconds for your muscular response (clicking space) and BOOM...skill check failed.
[*]One Killer, the Nurse, can hit you even if he doesn't aim at you. There is an autoaim mechanic that basically let's her hit Survivors automatically if she roughly aims in their direction. The worst abomination of that mechanic is when you run past the Killer quickly, but the killer hits you anyways at an 180° angle.
[*]The Killer's hit range is under special circumstances ridiculously high. There is a perk that allows you to run faster for a short period of time (Sprint Burst). If it activates while the killer starts performing a hit, you will run away from him, but get hit anyway at distances of over five meters. My high score was when a Nurse got me even though I was already so far away that the heartbeat-rate went down.
[*]One of the Killers has a chainsaw that kann down you immediately. This chainsaw can saw around corners, through walls and at rare occasions even at an 180° angle. It's magic!
[*]Some perks don't always or hardly ever work (Decisive Strike, Premonition, Selfheal, Crows from the Shadows).
[*]If Decisive Strike does work, you can end up stuck in the ground, unable to move.
[*]In some occasions, the normal sprinting doesn't work after you've been hit.
[*]You sometimes get locked in the crouching position until you get hit by the killer.
[*]Pallet vault doesn't always work. Especially when the killer is standing in the space where the pallet should drop. This is extra awesome, since there is a game mechanic that should allow you to rescue a Survivor that is carried on the Killer's shoulder by stunning him.
[*]When you drop a pallet, it happens many times that the game suddenly teleports you to the side of the pallet you were coming from, directly into the Killer's arms.
[*]While being carried by the Killer, you should be able to wiggle free. But the wiggle bar doesn't always show up. Same goes for the recover bar.
[*]When two interact-able objects are close together (e.g. a closet and a window) and you press space to get through it, you might get sucked sideways into or through the other object. The button layout generally needs improvement since too many actions are on the same buttons.
[*]From time to time you get stuck in stones or in between trees.
[*]The progress bar doesn't display exactly how far you have progressed. It fails in its entire existence: The exit gate doesn't open, the generator doesn't finish, the Survivor doesn't unhook and the hook doesn't get destroyed when the bar is already entirely full. This means that the Killer can still grab you when you already should have finished.
[*]When you get grabbed by the Killer, he can hang you on a hook. Then another Survivor has to unhook you. However, you might die randomly before they even get the chance to rescue you.
[*]You can also die while being unhooked (before the time runs out).
[*]Or unhook generally doesn't work and you are doomed.
[*]One of the Killers can lay bear traps. If one of them is close to a hook (but not directly under it) you can get sucked into the trap while unhooking.
[*]In certain locations, the traps sink into the ground and become invisible.
[*]The Survivor and Killer models are "solid" objects. You can't just run through them (usually, but there is also a glitch were you can). Players can use this to block others in narrow passages and Killers can prevent Survs from unhooking by just standing in front of the hook (body-blocking).
[*]To prevent players from hiding afk in a closet, the devs have added crows that will fly above a still standing Survivor after a while to give out their position. The problem is, the crows come way too early. If a Killer searches the area where you are more thoroughly than usually, you can't move that much. The crows will appear and basically get you killed.
[*]As Killer, grabbing Survivors while they unhook or escape through the hatch sometimes doesn't work.
[*]You don't always get your bloodpoints and pips after a game.
[*]There are a maximum of three daily rituals (challenges where you get bonus points) at a time. Usually you should be able to replace unfinished ones with a new one every day. It often doesn't work for days.
[*]A friend of mine lost all his items, addons and offerings that were on the second pages of the loadout screen.
[*]And last but not least: There is a bug that resets your entire game progress and you can't do anything about it. Thus, if you have really bad luck, you lose hundreds of hours of playtime.
[/list]

Well, that just have been the bugs. There are more reasons to not buy Dead by Daylight:

[list]
[*]The devs randomly ban people without specifying any reason.
[*]To stop people from using infinites (running circles through badly placed obstacles so that the Killer can't catch you), they boarded up most of the windows in the houses. As a result, you now often run into a dead end and end up dead.
[*]In addition, if you jump through a window three times in a short period of time, they get blocked by some magic fence.
[*]The stupidity of the pallet placement is hard to comprehend. There are pallets right between to two trees. Guess what, that doesn't stop the killer, since he can walk around trees! Shocking, isn't it?
[*]The ranking system is weird. You get points for getting chased, but not for staying hidden and thus alive. You can escape and still lose a rank (pip). There are also games where the Killer doesn't murder a single Survivor and still gets twice the points he needs to rank up (get a pip).
[*]The game allows players to destroy the fun of all other players. I'm talking about camping, body-blocking and infinites. I know, this sadly had become normal in online games, but that doesn't stop me from pointing it out.
[*]The developers rather focus on pay2 win  or overpriced cloathing DLCs instead of finally fixing all these bugs.
[/list]

Don't get me wrong, DbD can be fun at the beginning, especially with friends. But you'll often end up upset after playing and the fun you had can't eradicate your anger. Don't do this to you. It's not worth it.

Das spiel is an sich mega geil doch seid dem 1.4 Patch ist Killer spielen unmöglich geworden man hört keine schreienden Überlebenden mehr, Generatoren sind durch Wände auch nicht mehr zuhören ein Überlebender muss verletzt nur um eine Ecke gehen und der Killer hat dich verloren. Meiner Meinung nach sollten die Sounds wieder überarbeitet werden dann ist das Spiel wieder Top.
It's okay game just sometimes there are things missing. Like the map loading and bugs happening in the beginning

[h1][b]Update:[/b][/h1]

[b]Neue Erfahrung[/b]

Das verbinden in neuen Lobbys funktioniert mittlerweile. Wenn man allerdings als Killer spielen möchte wartet man schon relativ lange, um überhaupt in eine Lobby zu kommen. 
Dies ist darauf zurück zuführen dass immer mehr Killer spielen, da das Spiel komplett auf Killer balanced ist!

Ständig kommen neue Updates mit Maps und Perks, neue Killer sowieso.
Immer bessere Austattung für Killer, nach guten Perks beim Survivor sucht man bei den neuen DLC vergebens bzw. werden seltener, die man für "gut" oder "brauchbar" betiteln kann.

Die Änderungen sind somit nur für den Killer zum Vorteil!

T-Bagging, Camping (Facecamping), und tunneln sind hier angesagt, wer damit nicht klar kommt sollte besser seine Nerven schonen und Rate vom spielen ab.

Ich selber Spiele beide Seiten und merke das Survivor fast gar keine Chance mehr haben sich überhaupt zu befreien. Mit dem Rauswinden ist das perfekte Beispiel. Das ist so gemacht, das das Herauswinden eigentlich nicht mehr Funktioniert, da man davor sowiewso schon am Haken hängt. Der Abstand der Haken ist so dimensioniert das es ohne Zusatz Addons und ohne Hilfe von anderen Überlebenden via Paletten und Taschenlampe keine Chance haben sich zu befreien.
Wenn dann von anderen geholfen wird dann wir wieder rumgemeckert.

Volle Chats mit Beleidigungen, Aufregung uns Stress macherei sind hier Tagesprogramm.

Camping und alle anderen Spielmechaniken vom Killer werden ausgenutzt weil die wissen das Überlebenden sowieso an die Haken wollen um zu befreien bzw zu helfen, damit wenigstens etwas vom Spielbetrieb weiter gehen kann, was leider nach hinten losgeht.
Die neuen Perks (barbecue und Chili) erlaubt es den Killern bei jedem Aufhängen alle Überlebende die weiter als 40m vom Haken entfernt sind einzusehen.
Also klar das der direkt zu einem kommt. Mit diesem Perk sollte wohl das Campen beseitigt werden was leider überhaupt nicht funktioniert. 

Als Überlebender ist es mittlerweile sehr schwer eine Runde zu gewinnen. Wenn man doch mal das Glück hat vom Haken befreit zu werden ist die einzige Option von den Killern tunneln, da man ja leichtes Opfer ist. Die haben halt Angst dann überhaupt keinen Kill zu bekommen.

Ich denke der Entwickler muss einiges noch an Arbeit in dieses Game mit geiler gedachter Spielmechanik reinstecken, damit es irgendwann nicht stirbt. 
Er sollte auf Gleichberechtigung achten, dass nicht zu viel für den Killer verbessert wird sondern auch an die Überlebenden denken und endlich eine Lösung für dieses ständige Camping finden.
Eine Möglichkeit wäre z.B. kein Entitus Fortschritt wenn der Killer x Meter beim Haken steht.

Ich hätte natürlich noch mehrere Ideen aber diese hier aufzuzählen bringt leider nichts, denn der Entwickler setzt sowieso nicht die Wünsche der Spieler um, geschweige denn Reagiert darauf.

Man kann für die Zukunft hoffen, dass der Entwickler sich Gedanken macht und das Spiel richtig balanced.

Este juego demuestra un buen juego supervivencia cooperativa con amigos. Da una buena experiencia, buena idea, bien desarroyado. Lo que quita las ganas de jugar es cuando tienes pocos amigos (como yo okno) que juegas, o sobretodo si juegas de noche que puedes pasarte perfectamente una hora esperando por la cantidad de guiris y lobbies completos que hay.

"Отличная игра была, особенно за свои деньги. Но после последнего патча у многих появилось слишком много технических проблем, а у меня игра вообще не запускается. Поискал решение... если самому починить можно, то не просто. Думаю что разработчики пофиксят далеко не всё, и что у меня игра так никогда больше и не запуститься."
Раньше у меня был такой отзыв, и я не рекомендовал игру. Но на моё удивление они быстро отреагировали на проблему и выпусти такой патч, который даже починил MVC++2015. За то что не положили болт, однозначно Лайк.

Sigh... this is the hardest review I've had to write.

This game is interesting, compelling, and original. The game mechanic is great. The CORE game mechanic actually changes from movement to stealth in a way I've never experienced, even in metal gear games. Its exhillerating being chased and killed as the survivors and its fun to run around killing as the killer.

Unfortunately, the game is riddled with bugs. This current update (2/13/2017) made the game unplayable. And that's not me bitching about minor changes in game play mechanics... its literally broken and won't launch. 

I've held off my review in hopes that the developers would patch the game so i can rave about it up and down. Welp the cows have come to pasture and I feel that after playing 120 hours of the game, posting on steam forums about bugs, participating in test servers, and emailing devs all to have a patch that renders the application completely useless i think I've earned the right to bitch about it. Hell, I'm a paying consumer so why not?

Yesterday I played this game almost all day and night long. In that day, after hearing about the new patch I logged every game I was able to get into and play as well as every game that crashed due to errors. 

My logs for yesterday are as Follows:
68 attempted games played
51 games that did not load, crashed, errored out etc.
17 games succesfully laucned with no errors and were played

That means the application worked correctly only 25% of the time. 

All I can say is to stay away from this game. Its not working anymore... and even on its best days it only worked 1 out of 4 times.

If you happened to purchase this game and enjoyed it as much as I did (when it decides to work), put pressure on those devs. Thier game, as fun as it may be, is a defective product.  IT needs to be fixed or WE need to be reimbursed. You pay thier salary... not Behavior, not StarBreeze... YOU!

PS, Devs... I will personally remove this post and give it an incredibly positive and equally lengthy review once the game starts working as it should. It is not my intention to keep people from buying YOUR games... it is only to keep people from buying BROKEN games.

PPS, Devs... after fixing this game, how likely would it be to see another crossover monster/survivor combo?  I really wanna see a Ripley / Xenomorph or James Sunderland / Pyrimid Head update (just play Konami for the license you dicks, its dirt cheap right now)

Хмм, обзор? Почему бы и нет.
Если вы стоите перед выбором брать её или нет, то я постараюсь ответить вам на вопрос.
Брать. Почему? Она интересней чем кажется на первый взгляд, с друзьями тут можно убить кучу времени. Да, она может показаться однообразной и многие начнут орать что матчи ничем не отличаются друг от друга, но КС/Дота тоже однообразна, и люди же играют! К тому же, тут каждый уровень генерируется случайно, то есть вы можете не увидеть генератор в том месте в котором он был в прошлый раз на той же карте. И к тому же тут сегодня(13.02) подъехала довольно оxyeнная обнова в которой подтянули графику, добавили 1920x1080(Ну хотя бы постарались максимально приблизить к этому значению) и ещё кучу всего интересного! Да, здесь есть лаги/баги и т.д., но надо помнить что, насколько я знаю, эта игра была придумана 4-мя людьми и денег у них едва хватало, вроде 10к долларов(опять таки, на сколько я знаю) потом в компанию пришли другие люди, но начали её делать 4 человека, и поэтому им можно простить баги/лаги игры, они же не гиганты как Activision, Sony Entertainment, DICE.
Я рекомендую эту игру, помните что вы можете вернуть за неё деньги(с определёнными условиями, но вернуть же!).
Каждый человек имеет право выбора, я никого не заставляю её брать, это ваш выбор если вы её взяли, решение принимаете вы, и только вы!
Всем удачи.

Short Instructions how the game is:

This game should be named ,,waiting simulator'' or smth, the matchmaking is awful I never saw smth worse, if you get after 1h a round it is often a unfair killer (like you rank 20 and the killer rank 1-3) awful. There is a report system what help the game about 0%, if you report smbd nothing will happen and in the next round you play you will perhaps get the next hacker or camper or unfair player -,- 
This game is an example that a good idea in bad game gets destroyed

Pro:
Nice Gameplay and exciting playrounds                6/10
Much different Survivors and Killers                        7/10
Many Achievments and good Steam Cards            6/10

Cons:
DLC you have to pay and items for streamer            3/10
(awful) Matchmaking                                             1/10
Reportsystem         1/10    <--- to much hackers and bugs using people
Bugs are not fixed                                                1/10
Loadtimes:                                                           5/10
Every ten foots is a stupid hook so you don't have a chance to escape 0/10

PS: Bugs are worse since the update -,-
It is cool to play but you have to think about if it is worth to wait 1h for a round what is just awful

And typical is when a new DLC or maps comes: More Bugs and More Unfair.

EDITADO: 29/01/2019 
Al dia hoy de fue bastante mejorado, si lo recomiendo para jugar con amigos da muchas, insisto en que deberian agregar algun modo de juego o algo, pero por su precio la verdad que la rompe.. !!

---------------------------------------RESEÑA VIEJA ----------------------------------------------------

Al principio era un muy buen juego, innovador, algo fresco para el ambiente tan trillado de los videojuegos, con el paso de los DLC lamentablemente lo fueron arruinando .... Todavia tengo la esperanza de que vuelva a remontar porque le tengo Fe, la idea es genial... Vamos a ver que nos depara el futuro, por el momento no divierte asi que le doy pulgar para abajo, si vuelve como al principio lo subo !!....

This review, is kinda hard to decide whether I want to recommend the game or not.
But, for now I'll pick 'no', until someone proves me wrong.

The Pros of this game:
''Genuinely tense and nerve-wracking''
''Clever balancing between the two sides''
''Never predictable''
''Experience systems and unlocks add depth''

Cons of the game:
''May grow repetitive with time''
''Lobby and connection issues''

A-little background information on the game:
The action takes place in the kind of remote farms, forest lumberyards and wreckers yards you’ll have seen in any classic slasher movie, each map filled with abandoned buildings, piles of junk, areas of woodland and other spooky scenery. Each map is surrounded by a fence with a single powered gate, which requires three generators to be started which is kind of cool I presume.

Что я хочу сказать про эту игру проиграв в нее часов этак 400-450?По началу игра очень нравилась(все-таки игры подобной этой и довольно достойной не было).Игра по-настощему зацепила,даже в Дотан перестал играть,купил все DLC(со скидоном правда) и игра реально доставляла.НО,с каждым новым обновлением она становилась все хуже.
Во-первых, черный экран при поиске игры(только играя за выживших,за маньяков такой темы не наблюдается).Вроде бы можно играть и за маньяков без бесконечных зависаний в главном меню,но по мне игра за выжившего приносит намного больше драйва.
Во-вторых, количество читаков и прочих неприятных личностей.Разрабы, в свою очередь, норм системы античита не хотят подключить(в итоге даже у меня(играю без читов) пару раз игра не загружалась по причине того,что мой аккаунт не может пройти античит проверку.
В-третьих, ожидание катки составляет примерно минут 7-10 (с учетом черных экранов,вылета из лобби и т.д.),а сама игра длится (в зависимости от вашего скила конечн) минут 10 максимум. Так что время можно потратить довольно много. В-четвертых, очень часто игра вылетает прямо во время матча,со сбросом ранга игра и т.д.,что лично меня заставляет гореть довольно сильно. 
В-пятых, манера игры многих игроков желает лучшего(кампинг и проч нелицеприятное поведение).Хотя данное являение встречается во многих играх...
Подводя итоги, могу сказать,что даже несмотря на большое количество недостатков, игра все-равно остается довольно перспективной. Атмосфера на уровне. Советую к покупке,но в настоящий момент только по скидке,т.к. сейчас игра не стоит своих денег.Буду ждать новых обновлений в надежде на исправление всех багов и проч.
Пока количество минусов перевешывает.Думаю со мной многие согласятся.

Von der Idee ist das Spiel echt toll, spiele es mit zwei Freunden, alleine eher selten.
Es dauert eeeewig bis man als Gruppe mal irgendwann eine Runde gefunden hat. Meistens laggt das Spiel aber und ist eigentlich unspielbar. Seit ungefähr zwei Tagen komme ich und meine Freunde in gar keine Lobby mehr, da es verbuggt und beim laden bis jetzt IMMER abgestürzt ist.

Also gute Idee und wenn es mal irgendwie gehen sollte und es ausnahmsweise mal nicht laggen sollte oder der Killer campt, sodass das Spiel eigentlich auch unspielbar ist, macht es echt Spaß :)

Vielen dank auch
Отличная игра! 10 крюков из 10!

Adictivo. El juego consigue mantenerte en tensión prácticamente durante toda la partida en las primeras horas de juego. Esa tensión va disminuyendo a medida que le echas horas y te empiezas a adaptar. Aún así siempre habrá momentos tensos hayas jugado las horas que hayas jugado. 
Tanto jugando de superviviente como de asesino siempre habrá algo que te mantenga en tensión, ya sea el hecho de ser asesinado o el hecho de no asesinar a nadie y ver que eres incapaz de atrapar a un superviviente.

Como contra diría la inmensa cantidad de bugs que han habido y hay a día de hoy en el juego. Con cada parche intentan arreglar los errores pero siempre queda alguno suelto o aparecen nuevos. Aún así es jugable y muy entretenido.

Recomendado al 100%
Good Game

何故か殺人鬼が徘徊する場所に閉じ込められた生存者４名が
殺人鬼から隠れつつ、脱出口となるゲートに電源を投入する為に発電機を修理する。
簡単に説明するとこんな感じですが・・・
いざプレイしてみると、これがまた難しいし怖ろしい、しかし！それに負けないくらい楽しんでいる自分が居る
殺人鬼が近くを探している時に、うまく隠れ見つからなかったの安心感と、してやったり感
見つかって追われて居る時のドキドキ感、逃げ切れた時の達成感、どれも中毒になってしまう程の刺激があります。
こんなゲームをよく作り上げたな、と素直に賞賛します
ホラー好き、PｖP好き、アクション好きの皆さんに、堂々とお勧めできます！
